description: This file defines a client-side React component for handling Jira OAuth login redirection in a Next.js application. It immediately redirects the user to an external OAuth endpoint, preserving query parameters.

methods.name: JiraLoginRedirectPage
methods.description: Main React component that displays a Suspense fallback and triggers redirection.

methods.name: RedirectWorker
methods.description: Performs the redirection logic based on URL query parameters and environment variables.
